verses.text: Ha vinhaj Abimelec yuninal vinhaj Jerobaal, ix b'at vinh t'a Siquem lolonel yet' eb' sk'ab' yoc ix snun, ix yalan vinh t'a eb':

--Ha ticnaic sval t'ayex to wach' tze montej eb' eyetchonhab' t'a Siquem tik, tze k'anb'an t'a eb' icha tik: ¿Vach'am tzeyab'i to a 70 eb' yuninal vinhaj Jerobaal syak' yajalil t'a quib'anh, mato wach' to junnhej vinh tz'och cajaliloc? xe chi t'a eb'. Naeccoti to a innhej ay vuj in b'a eyed'oc, xchi vinh.

Ha eb' ayto yuj sb'a chi' yet' vinh, ix syamoch eb' yalan t'a eb' yetchonhab' t'a Siquem chi' to a vinhaj Abimelec chi' tz'och yajalil t'a skal eb'. Ix scha sk'ol eb' chonhab' chi' icha chi', yujto ayto yuj sb'a eb' yet' vinh.

Yuj chi' ix yiq'uelta 70 siclo q'uen plata eb' t'a yol stemplo comon dios scuchan Baal-berit, ix yak'an q'uen eb' t'a vinhaj Abimelec chi'. Ha yet' q'uen ix stup juntzanh eb' vinh jaragana vinac vinh yic tz'och eb' vinh yet' vinh. Te chuk juntzanh eb' vinh vinac chi'.

Yuj chi' ix b'at eb' vinh yet' vinh t'a Ofra, b'aj ek'nac vinh smam vinh. Ata' ix smilcham 70 eb' yuk'tac vinh t'a yib'anh jun q'uen q'ueen. Axonhej vinhaj Jotam ix colchajcani, yujto ix sk'ub'ejcanel sb'a vinh, aton vinh slajvub' yuninal vinhaj Jerobaal chi'.
Ixlajwi chi', ix smolb'an sb'a eb' aj Siquem yet' eb' aj Bet-milo t'a yich jun te' mach' t'a Siquem chi', b'aj ay jun q'uen q'ueen niwan yelk'och t'a eb'. Ata' ix yak'och vinhaj Abimelec eb' yajalil.

Ayic ix alchaj jun chi' t'a vinhaj Jotam chi', ix q'ue vinh t'a jun tzalan t'a spak'ul lum vitzal Gerizim, te chaanh ix avajemta vinh yic wach' masanil mach tz'ab'ani, ix yalan vinh icha tik: --Ex aj Siquem, maclejec eyab' jun ab'ix ol val tik yic wach' ol yab' Dios tas ol eyala'.
Ha junel, masanil ab' te te' ix snib'ej yak'och junok yajalil. Yuj chi' ix ab' yal te' t'a te' olivo to tz'och te' yajaliloc te' smasanil.
Ix ab' tak'vi te' olivo chi', ix yalan te': Maay, tato tzin och eyajaliloc e masanil, maxtzac am vak'laj aceite sk'anchaj yuj yik'jichaanh Dios, ma yic sk'anpax eb' anima, xchab' te'.
Ixlajwi chi', ab' yalanpax te' smasanil t'a te' higo yic tz'och te' yajalil.
Ix ab' yalanpax te' higo chi': Maay, tato tzin och eyajaliloc e masanil, maxtzac am vak' in sat te chi' sloji, xchab' te'.
Ix ab' yalanpax te' t'a te' uva to tz'och te' yajalil.
Ix ab' yalanpax te' uva chi': Maay, tato tzin och eyajaliloc e masanil, tzam vactej vak'an vino tz'ak'an tzalajb'oc sk'ol Dios yet' eb' anima, xchab' te'.
Slajvub'alxo ix ab' yalan te' t'a te' q'uiix to tz'och te' yajalil.

Ix ab' yalan te' q'uiix chi' to syal yoch te' yajaliloc te te' chi' smasanil. Ix ab' yalan te': Tato yel t'a smasanil e k'ol tzin eyak'och eyajaliloc, ochanhec t'a yalanh venhul tik e masanil. Tato max yal e k'ol tzin och eyajaliloc jun, elocab'cot jun niwan k'ak' t'ayin yic stz'acanb'at te' k'ute' t'a Líbano, xchab' te' q'uiix chi'.
Ha ticnaic jun, tzin k'anb'ej t'ayex: ¿Tom yel val wach' ix e k'ulej, yuj chi' ix eyak'och vinhaj Abimelec chi' eyajaliloc? ¿Tom smoj val icha chi' tzeyutej yinhtilal vinhaj Jerobaal chi' ticnaic?
Ix sb'ec sb'a vinh in mam chi' scham eyuuj ayic ex scolanelta vinh t'a yol sk'ab' eb' madianita.

Ha exxo tik, tas xom val eyaji, yuj chi' tzex meltzajoch ajk'olal t'a yinhtilal vinh in mam chi'. Ix e milcham 70 yuninal vinh t'a jun q'uen q'ueen, haxo vinhaj Abimelec yune' jun ix schecab' vinh in mam chi' ix eyak'och eyajaliloc, anhej am yujto ayto eyuj e b'a yet' vinh yuj snun.
Svalan t'ayex ticnaic: Tato wach' tze k'ulej t'a xilb'a in mam yet' t'a eb' yinhtilal, tzalajk'olalocab' eyaj yet' vinhaj Abimelec chi', wach'nhejocab' ol aj yelk'och vinh t'a e cal.

Tato manh wach'oc jun, elocab'cot junok niwan k'ak' t'a vinhaj Abimelec chi', yic tzex tz'ab'at ex aj Siquem yet' ex aj Bet-milo. Axo t'ayex tz'elpaxcot junok k'ak', yic stz'apaxb'at vinhaj Abimelec chi', xchi vinhaj Jotam chi'.
Ixlajwi yalan juntzanh chi' vinhaj Jotam chi', el lemnaj vinh, ix b'at cajnajcan vinh t'a Beer, yujto xiv vinh t'a vinhaj Abimelec vinh yuk'tac chi'.
Oxe' ab'il ix yak' yajalil vinhaj Abimelec t'a yib'anh chonhab' Israel chi'.
Axo Dios ix ak'anoch jun ajk'olal t'a skal vinh yet' eb' aj Siquem chi', ix meltzajoch eb' ajk'olal t'a vinh.
Icha chi' ix aj yak'ji spac t'a vinh yuj schamel 70 eb' vinh yuk'tac smilnacchamoc. Ix ak'jipax spac t'a eb' aj Siquem chi', yujto ix yak'och sb'a eb' yet' vinhaj Abimelec chi' t'a schucal chi'.

Ha eb' aj Siquem chi', ay eb' sb'at sk'ub'ejel sb'ha t'a titac b'e t'a spak'ultac lum vitz, tz'elta eb' t'a eb' anima tzek' t'a yol b'e tzek' t'a slak'anil chonhab' chi' yic tz'elk'an eb'. Ix alji yab' vinhaj Abimelec to icha chi' sk'ulej eb'.
Ha t'a jun pekti’ chi', ix k'och jun vinh scuchan Gaal yuninal vinhaj Ebed yet' eb' sk'ab' yoc t'a Siquem chi', wach' ix kan vinh t'a yol sat eb' anima ta'.

Ayic q'uinhxo te' uva, tz'el eb' t'a spatiquel chonhab', yic smolan te' eb', sb'oan vino eb'. Ix yak'anoch jun q'uinh eb', ix och ijan eb' sva'i yet' yuk'vi anh eb' t'a yol stemplo sdiosal. Ha val ta' te chuk ix yal eb' t'a spatic vinhaj Abimelec chi'.

Ix och ijan vinhaj Gaal chi' yalani: ¿Mach jun vinhaj Abimelec chi' yalani, yuj chi' tzonh yak' mandar vinh? Ha vinh chi', yuninal vinh vinhaj Jerobaal, haxo pax vinhaj Zebul schecab' vinh. Ha eb' vinh chi' malaj yelk'och eb' vinh. Ha onh pax aj Siquem onh tik, ¿tas yuj tonhej scak' co b'ha t'a vinh? ¿Tom ol onh ochnhej schecab'oc eb' vinh? Co naeccot ticnaic to a vinh co mam quicham, aton vinhaj Hamor, vinh b'oannacq'ue chonhab' Siquem tik, yuj chi' quiq'uequel co b'ha t'a yol sk'ab' vinhaj Abimelec chi'.
A... tato a in eyajalil in, toxom ix in satel vinhaj Abimelec chi', tzam val t'a vinh: Molb'ej eb' a soldado scak'an oval, xin chama, xchi vinh.
Ayic ix yab'an vinhaj Zebul, yajal t'a Siquem chi' tas ix yal vinhaj Gaal chi', ix te cot yoval vinh.
Elanhchamel ix yalb'at vinh t'a vinhaj Abimelec t'a elk'altac icha tik: Ix javi vinhaj Gaal yuninal vinhaj Ebed yet' eb' yuk'tac t'a tik, van yak'an sk'ol eb' anima eb' vinh t'a a patic.
Yuj chi' cotanh yet' eb' a soldado t'ak'walil, tze k'ub'anel e b'ha t'a titac chonhab' tik.
Axo yic toxo sakb'i, tzex och eyak' oval t'a chonhab' tik, haxo yic tz'elta vinhaj Gaal chi' yak' oval ed'oc yet' eb' soldado, ol xo ila' tas ol utej vinh, xchib'at vinhaj Zebul chi'.
Yuj chi' ix b'at vinhaj Abimelec t'ak'walil yet' eb' soldado. Chanh makan ix aj sk'ub'anel sb'a eb' t'a spatictac chonhab' Siquem chi'.
Ayic van yelta vinhaj Gaal t'a spuertail chonhab' chi', ix eltapax vinhaj Abimelec yet' eb' soldado b'aj k'ub'anel chi'.

Ayic ix yilan vinhaj Gaal chi', ix yalan vinh t'a vinhaj Zebul icha tik: --Iltonab'i, masanil t'a sattac vitz tz'emul eb' soldado, xchi vinh. --Maay, a yenhul lum vitz tzal animail chi' a ach tik, xchi vinhaj Zebul chi'.
Ix yalanxi vinhaj Gaal chi': --Anhejtona' ay eb' van yemta t'a tzalan scuchan Smuxuc Lum Luum. Van yempaxul eb' soldado t'a sb'eal b'aj nab'a ji yic eb' naumel lolonel, xchi vinh.

Ix yalanxi vinhaj Zebul chi' t'a vinh icha tik: --B'ajtil ay a lolonel ix laj al chi' ticnaic. Ix ala' to malaj yelk'och vinhaj Abimelec yic tzonh och schecab'oc vinh. Ha ticnaic chi' sjavi eb' soldado ix a b'uch chi', ixic chinaic, yic tzak' oval yet' eb', xchi vinh.
Ixlajwi chi', ix och vinhaj Gaal scuchb'an eb' anima t'a Siquem, ix b'at yak'an oval eb' yet' vinhaj Abimelec yet' eb' soldado.

Axo vinhaj Abimelec chi' ix och t'a spatic vinhaj Gaal yet' eb' ayoch yet'oc. Maj techajlaj scolan sb'a vinhaj Gaal chi', ix och lemnaj vinh scol sb'ha t'a yol chonhab' chi'. Tzijtum mach ix cham t'a stiel chonhab' chi'.
Ixlajwi chi', ix meltzaj vinhaj Abimelec chi' t'a chonhab' Aruma. Axo vinhaj Zebul chi' ix pechanel vinhaj Gaal yet' eb' sk'ab' yoc t'a Siquem chi' t'a junelnhej.
Axo t'a junxo k'u, ix b'at eb' aj Siquem chi' munlajel, ix yab'an vinhaj Abimelec chi',

yuj chi' ox makan ix yutej eb' soldado vinh, ix sk'ub'anel sb'a eb' t'a caltac te'. Ayic ix yilan eb' soldado chi' yelul eb' anima t'a spuertail chonhab', ix elta eb' b'aj k'ub'an chi', ix yak'an oval eb' yet' eb'.

D'a jun rato chi', ix b'at vinhaj Abimelec yet' jun makan eb' soldado smaccan spuertail chonhab' chi'. Palta haxo cha macanhxo eb' jun, ix yak' oval eb' yet' eb' anima ix elta munlajel t'a spatictac chonhab' Siquem chi'.

Pilan k'u ix yak' oval vinhaj Abimelec chi', masanto ix yak' ganar vinh satanel jun chonhab' chi'. Ix smilcham masanil anima vinh, ix smaq'uem vecnaj jun chonhab' chi' vinh, ix secancanem atz'am atz'am vinh t'a yib'anh.
Ayic ix yab'an eb' anima t'a cuartel b'aj scol sb'a eb' t'a Siquem tas ix ajkan Siquem chi' yuj vinhaj Abimelec chi', ix b'at eb' sk'ub'ejel sb'ha t'a yol stemplo comon dios scuch El-berit.
Ayic ix yab'an vinhaj Abimelec to ata' k'ub'anel eb' anima chi',

ix b'at vinh yet' masanil eb' soldado t'a jun vitz scuchan Salmón. Ix yik'anb'at jun q'uen ch'acab' vinh, ix sch'acanel jun sk'ab' jun te te' vinh, ix yak'anq'ue te' vinh t'a sjolom sjenhjab'. Ix yalan vinh t'a masanil eb' anima to icha pax chi' syutej eb' t'a elanhchamel.

Yuj chi' masanil anima ix ch'acanel junjun sk'ab' te te'. Ix och tzak'an eb' yuj vinh masanto ix k'och eb' t'a templo chi'. Ix smolb'ancanoch sk'ab'tac te te' chi' eb' t'a spatic b'aj k'ub'anel eb' anima chi'. Ix yak'anoch sk'ak'al te' eb', yuj chi' ix cham masanil eb' anima ayek' chi' ta'. Ay am miloc eb' vinh vinac yet' eb' ix ix, ix chami.
Ixlajwi chi', ix b'at vinhaj Abimelec chi' yet' eb' vinh soldado yak' oval t'a chonhab' Tebes. Elanhchamel ix yoy sb'a eb' t'a spatic chonhab' chi', ix yak'an ganar eb'.

Ha t'a snanhal yol jun chonhab' chi', ata' ay jun cuartel b'aj scol sb'a eb' anima ayic ay oval. Ata' ix b'at eb' anima sk'ub'ejel sb'a. Te wach' ix yutej eb' smacan spuertail, ix q'ue eb' t'a yib'anh.
Ix k'och lemnaj vinhaj Abimelec chi' t'a spuertail chi' yic syak'anoch sk'ak'al vinh yalani.
Axo jun ix ix ayq'ue t'a yib'anh cuartel chi' ix actanemta jun q'uen q'ueen yic molino. k'ocb'il val t'a sjolom vinhaj Abimelec chi' ix em q'ueen, ix apchaj vinh yuj q'ueen.

Elanhchamel ix yal vinh t'a jun vinh scuchumal syamk'ab' yic oval: Ik'cot q'uen espada, milinchamoc, malaj in gana ol alchajoc to a junok ix ix, ix in milani, xchi vinh. Yuj chi' ix yik'cot q'uen yespada vinh chi', ix stecanoch q'uen vinh t'a vinhaj Abimelec chi', ix cham vinh.
Ayic ix yilan eb' soldado to toxo ix cham vinh, ix meltzaj eb' t'a spat junjun.
Icha chi' ix yutej Dios yak'an spac t'a vinhaj Abimelec chi' yuj chukal sk'ulejnac t'a vinh smam, ayic smilannaccham 70 eb' vinh yuk'tac vinh.
Anheja' icha chi' ix ajpax yak'ji spac t'a eb' anima t'a Siquem chi' yuj schucal, ix elk'och scatab' vinhaj Jotam yuninal vinhaj Jerobaal t'a yib'anh eb'.
